A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Zero stars if I could give it\, but sadly there is no option. I thought Force Awakens was competent and Rogue One excellent\, almost on par with the original trilogy.\nThis\, however\, was an embarrassment. It fails BOTH on levels of being a movie and being a Star Wars movie. Basic foundations of a good movie are not there - script\, acting\, pacing\, directing. Plot holes are too numerous to count. And finally\, it literally mocks the universe created by previous movies.\nSadly\, I think this is the one that sinks the franchise\, although Disney will surely milk it dry. Paid critics should be ashamed.
